text: SSCA may refer to: ==Organisations== * Safe Schools Coalition Australia, a former national network of organisations working with school communities * Seven Seas Cruising Association, an international organization for cruisers based in the US * State Secretariat of Civil Aviation, the civil aviation agency of Cambodia * Shining Stone Community Action, a Beijing-based organization whose mission is to engage citizens in public decision making * Springdale School Community Association, of the Springdale School, a building in Springdale, Oregon, US * Safe Sane Consensual Adults, which merged with the National Leather Association International ==Other uses== * Single-strand conformation analysis, see bisulfite sequencing
title: SSCA
